newsitem.title: LEBANON: Beirut bank net profit up 29.6 pct in Q1.
newsitem.headline: Beirut bank net profit up 29.6 pct in Q1.

text.p: Bank of Beirut net profits rose 29.61 percent to $1,593,000 in the first quarter of 1997, according to unaudited results issued by the bank on Monday.
Net profits stood at $1,229,000 at the end of the first quarter of 1996, the bank said.
BOB shares, which made a spectacular debut on the Beirut Stock Exchange on April 11, have risen 61 percent over price issue of $2.17 -- closing at $3.5 on Monday.
Bank of Beirut ranked 17th in 1996 among Lebanon's 82 commercial banks in terms of customer deposits and 13th in terms of net profits.
